meanings.sent1: The breakages in the window were caused by a stray baseball.
meanings.sent2: She carefully cleaned up the breakages of the vase that fell off the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The breakages of the plate made a loud noise that startled the cat.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt like it was full of breakages after the breakup.
meanings.sent5: The breakages of the mirror reflected the sunlight in all directions.

meanings.definition: The result of something being broken.
meanings.sent1: The breakages on the floor were sharp and dangerous.
meanings.sent2: He had to pay for the repair of the breakages in the car window.
meanings.sent3: The breakages of the toy made it look like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent4: Her spirit felt like it was filled with breakages after the loss.
meanings.sent5: The breakages of the ice created a beautiful pattern on the frozen lake.
